content: long tail cast on place marker and join knit 8 rounds join rims line up both sets of circular needles so they are parallel to each other with the needle holding the 12 row brim to the rear knit 1 st from each set of needles together until all sts are knit and now on one needle note that 3 of the 4 needle points will be used here the right rear needle is not part of the join round the rear needle will be set aside once all the stitches have been joined on the front needle 94 108 sts now on 1 set of needles hat body knit next round increasing 4 sts evenly across round 98 112 sts knit 3 rounds if no border is desired go to continue hat body if adding the swirl work 17 row of swirl chart 7 8 times across each round swirl chart blank = mc o = cc continue hat body knit all rnds in mc until hat is about 5 5 ins from including naturally rolled bottom edge begin top decrease below changing to dpns when needed to complete note when working decreases keep in mind a desired finished height of between 8 and 9 inches if the hat looks to be getting too tall work fewer knit rnds between the decrease rnds instead of knitting 2 rnds knit only 1 round too short add more rounds
